Plot: Three ordinary guys are thrust into a parallel world of an old Sci-Fi movie. Trapped in a low budget universe they must somehow fight their way home before it is too late.
Title: This Giant Papier-Mâché Boulder Is Actually Really Heavy
Writer: Andrew Beszant, Christian Nicolson, Christian Nicolson
Actors: Andrew Beszant, Luci Hare, Lucy Hare, Tansy Hayden
